title: Modern bread making
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, Peter Whitchurch and Jack Gardiner
brief_description: The whole process of bread making in a highly mechanised factory. Weighing and mixing the ingredients, the bread rising, mechanical cutting, moulding and oil spraying of the loaves; baking, slicing, wrapping and despatch. Presented by the bakers of Tip Top Bread.
